info.description:
Domainrobot JSON API for managing: Domains, SSL
											Certificates, DNS and
											much more.
info.title: Domainrobot JSON API

get.summary: Gets the token-configuration of the logged in user.

post.summary: Creates a temporary token for the logged in user. The response contains the qr code as a base64 image.

post.description: Login and create a new session.

parameters.name: acl
parameters.description: Specifies whether the acls are returned in the response. Returns extra data if parameter is set. Example : ?acl

parameters.name: profiles
parameters.description: Specifies whether the user profile is returned in the response. Returns extra data if parameter is set. Example : ?profiles

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: Specifies whether the customer data is returned in the response. Returns extra data if parameter is set. Example : ?customer

parameters.name: subscription
parameters.description: Specifies whether the subscriptions are returned in the response. Returns extra data if parameter is set. Example : ?subscription

parameters.name: nameServerGroup
parameters.description: Specifies whether the nameserver groups are returned in the response. Returns extra data if parameter is set. Example : ?nameServerGroup

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Defines the timeout of the session in minutes. Default is 10 minutes. Example : timeout=60

get.description: Logout and delete the current session.

sepa.description: The customers sepa mandate if payament was post with sepa.

caType.description: The type of the intermediate certificate.

status.description: The actual status of the credit card

name.description: The domain name the authentication data belongs to.

dns.description: The dns entry for dns based authentication.

fileName.description: The filename for file based authentication.

fileContent.description: The content for file based authentication.

approverEmails.description: The approver addresses for email based authentication.

provisioning.description: Activates automatic provisioning of the zone for dns based authentication.

updater.description: The updating user of the object.

partnerOrderId.description: The order number of the related request

software.description: The webserver software in use, relevant values: 'II5' for Mircosoft, 'APACHE2' for Linux

comment.description: A custom field. Can only be updated via PUT /certificate/{id}/_comment. Requires appropriate ACLs.

signatureHashAlgorithm.description: The signature hash algorithm which was used

expire.description: The date on which the certificate expires

histories.description: The history of the certificate (old certificate versions)

password.description: The password that is to be used for the certificate download. Only for S/MIME!

organizationUnitName.description: The organization unit. Only for S/MIME!

certificateTransparency.description: Activates the certificate transparency for a certificate. Default is "True".

certificateTransparencyPrivacy.description: The privacy settings for certificate transparency. Default is "Redacted".

domain.description: The domain, which the redirect belongs.

hasCsr.description: States if a self created CSR is to be used for S/MIME. Default is false. Only for S/MIME!

idn.description: The IDN version of the URL of the target domain.

san.description: The subject alternative names, listed in the csr.

keySize.description: The size of the csr key.

countryCode.description: The country code defined in the csr.

challengePassword.description: The password defined in the csr.

state.description: The state defined in the csr.

city.description: The city defined in the csr.

organization.description: The organization defined in the csr.

organizationUnit.description: The organization unit defined in the csr.

email.description: The email defined in the csr.

idn.description: The idn version of the common name.

revoked.description: The revoked date of the certificate.

id.description: The unique identifier of the contact

updater.description: The updating user of the object.

alias.description: The unique alias of the contact

state.description: The local country state of the contact

domainsafe.description: The nic references of the contact

verification.description: The verification status of the contact

fname.description: The first name of the contact

lname.description: The last name of the contact

phone.description: The phone number of the contact

fax.description: The fax number of the contact

nicRef.description: The nic references of the contact

eligibilityId.description: The corresponding ID number for the eligibility name if applicable, if in doubt just use the same details as your Registrant ID.

eligibilityName.description: This field is usually optional and whether it is required is determined by your policy reason for the domain registration, if in doubt just use the same details as your Registrant Name.

eligibilityType.description: The type of entity that the registrant is.

registrantId.description: Australian Business Number or Registered Business Number.

registrantIdType.description: Concerns the Registrant ID which you have selected in the Registrant ID form field.

intededUse.description: The statement of intended use for the domain name.

intendedUse.description: The statement of intended use for the domain name.

others.description: Additional descriptions for OTHIDV and OTHORG.

above18.description: Is the person 18 years of age or older. For Person only.

entityType.description: The number of the matching entity.

adminType.description: Contact is the administrative contact with the permission to act as an independent agent / recruiter on behalf of the listed registrant.

contactTitle.description: Title of the domain contact in the organization.

hrMember.description: Choose whether the contact is is a member of the Human Resource Organization

adressLine1.description: The first line of the address.

adressLine2.description: The second line of the address.

adressLine3.description: The third line of the address.

intendedUse.description: The statement of intended use for the domain name.

role.description: The role as contact reference type

territoryLinkedTaxpayerNumber.description: Territory-linked Taxpayer Number (kpp). Mandatory for organisations which belong to the Russian Federation.

enterpriseId.description: The enterprise ID, in the specific context of .swiss based on current rules, is the Swiss UID/IDE/IDI.

status.description: the status of the domain Verification

deactivation.description: the deactivation of the domain Verification

token.description: The one time password in case of 2fa authentication.

domain.description: The domain of the mail exchange to backup

idn.description: The idn version of the domain.

updated.description: The date of the last updated

updater.description: The last updater of the entry

target.description: The hostname of the target mailserver

bannedFiles.description: The banned files options to use

header.description: The mail header options to use

ttl.description: The ttl of main address to use

status.description: The status of the message code.

updater.description: The updating user of the object.

status.description: The actual status of the entry, active means ok.

object.description: The name of the subscription, e.g. the contract number

description.description: The human readable name of the subscription, e.g. the name of a package

period.description: The period used by the subscription, e.g. 1 month

articleTypeLabel.description: The article type label of the subscription, e.g. domain

articleLabel.description: The article label of the subscription, e.g. backup_mx

businessCase.description: The businessCase of the subscription, e.g. create

name.description: The custom label for the group

articleLabel.description: The article label of the name server group, will be used for each created zone using these group

statistic.description: If the group contains statistical data for a zone

job.description: The job data. Available if the message is a job message

notify.description: The notification data. Available if the message is a notification message

stid.description: The server transaction id.

ctid.description: the custom transaction id.

messages.description: The general localized messages.

object.description: The object of the job or notify.

message.description: A message with more information, if the status is FAILED.

data.description: The subject products

updater.description: The updater of the object.

source.description: The domain to be redirected. Enter the domain with or without "www".

target.description: The URL of the target domain. Enter the domain without "http://"

domain.description: The domain, which the redirect belongs.

sourceIdn.description: The IDN version of the domain to be redirected. Enter the domain with or without "www".

targetIdn.description: The IDN version of the URL of the target domain. Enter the domain without "http://"

ttl.description: TTL of the record (Optionally if not set then Default SOA TTL is used)

type.example: A, MX, CNAME, TXT, SRV, PTR, AAAA, NS, CAA, PROCEED_MUC, TLSA, NAPTR, SSHFP, LOC, RP, HINFO, PROCEED, ALIAS, DNSKEY, NSEC, DS
type.description: The type of the record, e.g. A

pref.description: Preference of the record, need for some record types e.g. MX

value.description: The primary key of the object.

summary.description: The amound of objects found in list tasks.

data.description: The value of the object.

code.description: The result code of the response

text.description: The text representation of the result code.

confirmSignature.description: The date of the confirm signature

confirmIp.description: The address of the confirm signature

confirmUseragent.description: The user agent of the confirm signature

confirmChecked.description: Flag for indicating if the confirm data has been checked

expire.description: Date after the mandate will be expired

histories.description: A list of historized sepa mandates

accountHolder.description: The holder of the bank account

refresh.description: The seconds after the secondary should refresh the zone data

retry.description: The seconds after the secondary should retry the zone data after the refresh has been timeouts

expire.description: The seconds after the zone data will not be delievered, if the zone could not be reached on the master.

email.description: The email address of the responsible of the zone

fname.description: The first name of the contact

lname.description: The last name of the contact

phone.description: The phone number of the contact

fax.description: The fax number of the contact

state.description: The local country state of the contact

updater.description: The updating using of the object

approverEmail.description: The approver email of the san.

orderId.description: The order id of the san.

device.description: The device, which uses the trusted app.

comment.description: A comment for the trusted application.

logId.description: The id of the related log-entry.

comment.description: A custom field. Can only be updated via PUT /zone/{name}/{nameserver}/_comment. Requires appropriate ACLs.

domainsafe.description: true if the domain is represented in the domain safe

source.description: Nameserver, the zone is copied from via AXFR (for zone_import)

sourceVirtualHostname.description: System name server to look up the zone to copy

zoneGrantsAdd.description: Adds new zone garnts to the zone

zoneGrantsRem.description: Removes the zone garnts if exists.

main.description: IP address of the zone (A record)

virtualNameServer.description: The first nameserver managed by the system

grants.description: The grants where transfer (axfr) can be done from.

roid.description: The resource object identifier of the zone

resourceRecordsAdd.description: Adds new zone records to the extistings

resourceRecordsRem.description: Removes the zone records if exists.

formatted.description: Full mailing address, formatted for display or use on a mailing label. This field MAY contain multiple lines, separated by newlines. Newlines can be represented either as a carriage return/line feed pair ("\r\n") or as a single line feed character ("\n")

street_address.description: Full street address component, which MAY include house number, street name, Post Office Box, and multi-line extended street address information. This field MAY contain multiple lines, separated by newlines. Newlines can be represented either as a carriage return/line feed pair ("\r\n") or as a single line feed character ("\n")

region.description: State, province, prefecture, or region component

postal_code.description: Zip code or postal code component

name.description: End-User's full name in displayable form including all name parts, possibly including titles and suffixes, ordered according to the End-User's locale and preferences.

given_name.description: Given name(s) or first name(s) of the End-User. Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple given names; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters.

family_name.description: Surname(s) or last name(s) of the End-User. Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple family names or no family name; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters

middle_name.description: Middle name(s) of the End-User. Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple middle names; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters. Also note that in some cultures, middle names are not used.

nickname.description: Casual name of the End-User that may or may not be the same as the given_name. For instance, a nickname value of Mike might be returned alongside a given_name value of Michael.

preferred_username.description: Shorthand name by which the End-User wishes to be referred to at the RP, such as janedoe or j.doe. This value MAY be any valid JSON string including special characters such as @, /, or whitespace

profile.description: URL of the End-User's profile page. The contents of this Web page SHOULD be about the End-User.

picture.description: URL of the End-User's profile picture.

website.description: URL of the End-User's Web page or blog. This Web page SHOULD contain information published by the End-User or an organization that the End-User is affiliated with.

email_verified.description: True if the End-User's e-mail address has been verified; otherwise false.

gender.description: URL of the End-User's profile picture.

phone_number.description: End-User's preferred telephone number. E.164 [E.164] is RECOMMENDED as the format of this Claim, for example, +1 (425) 555-1212 or +56 (2) 687 2400. .

phone_number_verified.description: True if the End-User's phne number has been verified; otherwise false.
